name: Lay's Kettle Cooked Potato Chips
description: A chip (often just chip, or crisp in British and Irish English) may be a thin slice of potato that has been either deep fried or baked until crunchy. they're commonly served as a snack, side dish, or appetizer. the essential chips are cooked and salted; additional varieties are manufactured using various flavorings and ingredients including herbs, spices, cheeses, other natural flavors, artificial flavors, and additives.
